entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Malahat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water in the evening. Wind becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
